summary: "The Incredible Hulk" is a 2008 superhero movie about the Marvel character, Hulk. Bruce Banner (played by Edward Norton) turns into the Hulk due to a military experiment. He runs from the military while trying to fix himself. After the 2003 "Hulk" movie didn't do well, Marvel made this one, with more action and less like the previous film. It made over $265 million. Norton didn't continue as Banner due to disagreements with Marvel, and Mark Ruffalo took over in later movies.
title: The Incredible Hulk (film)
